constructor.details: init the contract (dont forget to also configure setupBinaryOptions afterwards, and deposit tokens)

params.launchTime: the length of the launch bonus multiplier (in seconds)

params.total: the BIOP tokens to transfer into this contract from multisig

params.amount: the amount in BIOP to add to transfer to this user*
the amount of value in bet

params.totalInterchange: amount interchanged since LPs last claim
params.totalStaked: the total amount staked by all LPs*

params.lastInterchange: the total interchange the last time the LP staked/claimed
